hero.title: Contact: share context, get a path
hero.subtitle: To make this efficient, we start with evidence: your stage, constraints, and the one bottleneck that keeps repeating. From there we match the right next step—framework study, a structured program, or an audit-focused review loop. The priority is to rebuild perception and execution first, with risk boundaries explicit and expectations clear.
highlights: Faster replies when you describe stage, goal, and constraints.
We match training by bottleneck: discipline, structure, review.
No investment advice and no performance promises.
hero.risk: Educational content only. Not investment advice; trading involves risk.
